actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to eliminate deductions from supplemental annuities on account of private pensions.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to eliminate deductions from supplemental annuities payable under such Act on account of private pensions.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to eliminate deductions from supplemental annuities on account of private pensions.
